recipe_name: Avocado Soup with Chicken and Lime
ingredients: 4 (6 inch) corn tortillas, julienned, 1   +   1/2 tablespoons olive oil, 1  white onion, sliced thinly, 8 cloves garlic, thinly sliced, 4  fresh jalapeno peppers, sliced, 8 ounces skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into thin strips, 1 quart chicken broth,   +   1/4 cup fresh lime juice, 1  tomato, seeded and diced,   salt and ground black pepper to taste, 1  avocado - peeled, pitted and diced,   +   1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro
nutrition: Total Fat 15g 20%, Saturated Fat 2g 12%, Cholesterol 37mg 12%, Sodium 1048mg 46%, Total Carbohydrate 25g 9%, Dietary Fiber 7g 23%, Total Sugars 4g, Protein 17g, Vitamin C 24mg 122%, Calcium 59mg 5%, Iron 1mg 8%, Potassium 590mg 13%
